overview: At 6 months old, Benedict was diagnosed with Trigonocephaly, a rare skull condition in which a baby's skull fuses together before birth. His parents were told he would have to have surgery shortly after his 1st birthday. 17 years later, this documentary created by Benedict himself and composed of home videos recorded between 1999 and 2001 explores the unlikely experience from his parent's perspective.
title: Trigonocephaly: A Documentary About Me
